channel.title: Gradle on wiseturtles's team blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gradle on wiseturtles's team blog

item.title: gradle代理设置
item.description: Android使用Gradle做构建工具，编译apk时可能需要从网上下载一些依赖包，国内网络情况大家都懂得。 Gradle代理设置 :::bash $ cat ~/.gradle/gradle.properties systemProp.http.proxyHost=your-proxy systemProp.http.proxyPort=proxy-port
